id.description: Unique identifier for the order product.

order_id.description: ID of the order to which the product belongs.

product_id.description: ID of the product associated with the order product.

variant_id.description: ID of the variant associated with the order product.

order_address_id.description: ID of the order address associated with the order product.

name_customer.description: Name of the customer who purchased the product.

name_merchant.description: Name of the merchant selling the product.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) of the product.

upc.description: Universal Product Code (UPC) of the product.

base_price.description: Base price of the order product.

price_ex_tax.description: Price of the product excluding tax.

price_inc_tax.description: Price of the product including tax.

price_tax.description: Tax amount on the product price.

base_total.description: Total cost of the order product.

base_cost_price.description: Base cost price of the order product.

cost_price_tax.description: Tax amount on the cost price.

is_refunded.description: Indicates if the order product has been refunded.

quantity_refunded.description: Quantity of the product that has been refunded.

return_id.description: ID of the return associated with the order product.

wrapping_id.description: ID of the wrapping associated with the order product.

base_wrapping_cost.description: Base wrapping cost of the order product.

wrapping_cost_tax.description: Tax amount on the wrapping cost.

quantity_shipped.description: Quantity of the product that has been shipped.

event_name.description: Name of the event associated with the order product.

event_date.description: Date of the event associated with the order product.

fixed_shipping_cost.description: Fixed shipping cost of the order product.

ebay_item_id.description: eBay item ID associated with the order product.

ebay_transaction_id.description: eBay transaction ID associated with the order product.

option_set_id.description: ID of the option set associated with the order product.

parent_order_product_id.description: ID of the parent order product if this is a child product.

is_bundled_product.description: Indicates if the product is a part of a bundle.

bin_picking_number.description: Bin picking number associated with the order product.

external_id.description: External ID associated with the order product.

gift_certificate_id.description: ID of the gift certificate associated with the order product.

applied_discounts.description: Discounts applied to the order product.

configurable_fields.description: Configurable fields of the order product.
